Reference

All functions

add_tail_muts()

Associate number of tail mutations to the leaves of a sample tree.

calculate_ccf()

Calculate ccf for nodes of a sample tree.

check_input_counts()

Check if counts input data has the correct form. Check if the input data has the correct fields and stop if someone is missing.

check_input_vaf()

Check if VAF input data has the correct form. Check if the input data has the correct fields and stop if someone is missing.

counts_inference_code()

Generate stan model for counts inference.

filter_nodes()

Prunes a sample tree.

fit_counts()

A PEPI fit with cell counts inference is returned.

fit_s()

Infer epimutation clocks in number of cell divisions and fitness of + cells with respect to - cells.

fit_tree()

Fit a multivariate vaf spectrum with epigenetic tree model.

fitness_inference_code()

Generate stan model for fitness inference.

generate_nodes()

generative models Bla bla

generate_spectrum()

Simulate VAF multivariate spectrum associated to a sample tree.

get_average_counts()

Get average predicted cell counts from the fit.

get_average_tree()

utilities inference Get the inferred tree from a fit.

get_clusters()

Infer clusters from data and inferred tree.

get_colors()

Associate colors to nodes.

get_pepi_theme()

Generate personalized ggplot theme.

get_posterior()

Get posterior distribution from PEPI object.

get_prior()

to fix Get draws from prior used for the inference

init_counts()

Create a PEPI object of Counts type.

init_vaf()

Create a PEPI object of VAF type.

plot_counts()

Plot predicted vs input counts.

plot_inference()

Plot posterior and prior distributions.

plot_marginal()

Plot marginal VAF distributions with cluster associated to tree nodes.

plot_multivariate()

plotting functions Plot multivariate VAF distributions with cluster associated to tree nodes.

plot_tree()

Plot sample tree with branches associated to nodes.

tree_inference_code()

Generate stan model for tree inference.
